member.name: T:Restaurant.Api.Controllers.OptionController.ParametersDemo
member.summary: This class is for demonstration purposes. The optional values need to be put in as class properties in order for Swagger to be able to display them properly. There is nothing wrong with having something like Get([FromQuery] Option<string> text), it's going to work, it's just that it will not be properly displayed in the Swagger UI.

If town with current ID does not exist.
If restaurant with current name and town already exist.

member.name: M:Restaurant.Api.Controllers._Base.ApiController.Ok(MediatR.Unit)
member.summary: Enables using method groups when matching on Unit.

member.name: T:Restaurant.Api.OperationFilters.OptionOperationFilter
member.summary: This operation filter only works on types that are contained in a class. Optional values that are put as type parameters will not be properly displayed in Swagger, although they will work.
